hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #0# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the Groose is loose.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #Epona's Song#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path of #time#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Medigoron).text: I once glued a set of false teeth to the Boomerang.^${12 39 c7}That came back to bite me.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Water Temple#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Goron Ruby#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: Hi @, we've been trying to reach you about your horse's extended warranty.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Heart Piece Room

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Magic Beans#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: When the moon hits Termina like a big pizza pie that's game over.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Saria's Song#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #the Tower#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #0# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #0# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Zelda's Lullaby# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #the Shadow Temple# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

ZF (Fairy).text: Use Multiworld to cross the gaps between worlds and engage in jolly co-operation!

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple Boss Key# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Deku Tree#.
